participant_abstract.sent: We attempted to define the concept of our product from the point of view of user interface, industrial design and marketing.
The user interface expert very much wants voice recognition and a T shape.
The industrial designer feels that voice recognition is too complicated to develop for easy use in this type of product.
I feel that for marketing I want to be first on the market.
I want it simple and I want it eye-catching.

participant_decisions.sent: Battery power will be used push buttons will be used strong trendy compact case will be used

participant_problems.sent: Still too many features being cast about.
